# GKInviteRecipientResponse.accepted

**Case**

A response when the player accepts the invitation.

## Declaration

```swift
case accepted
```

## Responses

- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.declined**: A response when the player rejects the invitation.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.failed**: A response when the system fails to deliver the invitation to the player.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.incompatible**: A response when the player isn’t running a compatible version of the game.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.unableToConnect**: A response when the system can’t contact the player.
- **GKInviteRecipientResponse.noAnswer**: A response when the invitation times out because the player doesn’t answer it.
